title: (4) Assorted Pipe Fitting Tool Bundle- $232 Retail Price
item_description:
(4) Assorted Pipe Fitting Tool Bundle- $232 Retail Price

PEX-A Expansion Tool Kit with 1/2 in., 3/4 in. and 1 in. Expander Heads, 3/8 in. to 1 in. 1-Hand PEX-B Pinch Clamp Tool, 3/8 in., 1/2 in. and 3/4 in. PEX-B Quick-Cinch Clamp Tool

  • This unit is either overstock, a shelf pull, or a return from The Home Depot.
  • Bid with Confidence Guarantee: If the item does not match the description provided, you may leave the item behind for a full refund. This offer is only eligible on the day of pickup, in person, by either the buyer or the buyers authorized representative.
